title: Organization Domain Schema
description: Schema for the structured entity within which activities and value delivery occur to achieve strategic objectives

organization.description: Represents the structured entity that enables the flow of value to customers, stakeholders, or outcomes

orgTitle.description: The name or title of the Organization

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Organization entails

structure.description: The Organization structure of the company

values.description: The core values guiding the Organization

strategicGoals.description: Long-term goals that align with the mission and vision

legalStructure.description: The legal structure of the Organization

geographicPresence.description: Locations and geographic reach of the Organization

size.description: The size of the Organization in terms of employees, revenue etc

history.description: The history and milestones of the Organization

strategicInitiatives.description: Key Initiatives to drive strategic goals

organizationUnits.description: A sub-division or entity within an organization that focuses on specific functions, processes, or objectives

orgUnitTitle.description: The name or title of the Organization unit

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Organization unit entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Organization unit within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Organization unit

higherOrganizationUnit.description: The Organization or Organization unit above in the Organization hierarchy

subOrganizationUnits.description: Sub-Organization units directly below this Organization unit in the Organization hierarchy

roles.description: Specific roles within the Organization unit

processes.description: Key processes carried out by the Organization unit

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure effectiveness and efficiency

dependencies.description: Other units, processes or systems that the unit depends on

relatedUnits.description: Organization units that are related or linked

strategicAlignment.description: Alignment with strategic goals and objectives

domainRelationships.description: Relationships between organization units and different business architecture domain entities

domainEntityName.description: Name of the domain entity involved in the relationship

domainEntityType.description: Type of domain entity (Capability, Service, Information, etc.)

relationshipRole.description: Role in the relationship (Owning unit, Providing unit, Consuming unit, etc.)

description.description: Details about the nature of the relationship
